name: The Moon Wed Saturn
description:
A short romance

IFComp 2020 competitor

Two girls living a simple, if peculiar, love story where not much seems to happen.

The Moon wed Saturn is text-only interactive fiction and a short narrative experiment about intertwined memories. A computer or a tablet is recommended.

·

The writing is deft and poetic.

~ Enrique Henestroza

... uses the possibilities of electronic fiction rather nicely.

~ Victor Gijsbers

A really nice example of non-chronological storytelling.

~ Quackoquack

Ps. Opus 4. October 2020

More interactive fiction:

The Master of the Land (6th position in IFComp 2018) The good people (XYZZY Awards 2019 nominee - Best Writing, Best Story, Best Use of Multimedia)
